headline: Block stock explodes after Jack Dorsey makes a radical bet
summary: Wall Street just sent a jarring message: cutting half your workforce is good for business. Block (XYZ) shares surged more than 22% in after-hours trading this week after CEO Jack Dorsey announced plans to eliminate more than 4,000 jobs, nearly halving the company's headcount from over 10,000 to ...

headline: Block Inc. (XYZ) Skyrockets 16.8% as Firm Lets Go of 4K Employees for AI

headline: Block’s Big AI Shift Reshapes Workforce And Tests Long Term Returns
summary: Block (NYSE:XYZ) announced a restructuring that will cut over 40% of its workforce as it shifts toward an AI driven operating model. CEO Jack Dorsey framed the layoffs as a proactive move to create smaller, more agile teams powered by AI tools rather than a response to financial stress. The announcement came alongside strong financial results and raised forward guidance, with management highlighting improved gross profit expectations. For investors watching Block at a share price of $63.7,...
